com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice

Class TextFieldSearchOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.ExtendedSearchOption
      • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.TextFieldSearchOption

  • public final class TextFieldSearchOption
extends ExtendedSearchOption
    An extended search option which is displayed as a Text Field. Allows the user to enter a String value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextFieldSearchOption(String code, String label, String defaultValue, Class inputType)
      The default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Converts a String, e.g.

      Initial value on opening the search panel.
      Class getInputType()
      Returns the type of input expected for this options (text or number etc).

      • Methods inherited from class com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.databaseservice.ExtendedSearchOption

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextFieldSearchOption

        public TextFieldSearchOption(String code,
                     String label,
                     String defaultValue,
                     Class inputType)
        The default constructor.
        Parameters:
        code - Unique identifier for this option.
        label - To display next to the text field
        defaultValue - The initial value in the text field (may be empty regardless of input type).
        inputType - type of values which this text field accepts. can be one of [String.class, Integer.class or Double.class]. String.class will result in a normal text field. Integer and Double.class will gaurantee the user inputs a valid Integer or Double respectively. The value held by the query for this option will be a String in all cases though (and must be parsed). The value may be an empty string if the user didnt enter anything and the default is empty, so this case must be checked for before attempting to parse to a number.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultValue

        public String getDefaultValue()
        Initial value on opening the search panel.
        Returns:
        the default value of this field

      • getInputType

        public Class getInputType()
        Returns the type of input expected for this options (text or number etc).
        Returns:
        the type of input expected

      • convertStringToInputType

        public Object convertStringToInputType(String string)
        Converts a String, e.g. from a JTextField, to an object of type getInputType() if it is one of the special types that this class handles, else returns the String.
        Parameters:
        string - the String to convert
        Returns:
        string converted to an object of type getInputType() if the type is one of the special types that this class handles, else string.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if string was not in the correct format
        Since:
        API 4.42 (Geneious 5.4.2)
